identificationModule.briefTitle: Safety and Tolerability of XmAb®7195 in Adult Healthy Volunteers and Adult Subjects With a History of Allergic Rhinitis and/or Allergic Conjunctivitis and/or Atopic Dermatitis
identificationModule.officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blinded, Placebo-Controlled, Ascending Dose Study of the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of XmAb®7195

descriptionModule.briefSummary: This first-in-human (FIH) study is a randomized, double-blinded, placebo-controlled, ascending dose study to investigate the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics of XmAb7195 in adult healthy volunteers and in adult subjects with elevated IgE levels.

interventions.name: XmAb7195
interventions.description: Part 1 and 2: Single IV infusion of XmAb7195 or placebo Part 3: Two-dose sequential IV infusion of XmAb7195 or placebo on Day 1 and Day 8

primaryOutcomes.measure: Number of adverse events including type and severity
primaryOutcomes.description: Number, type and severity of adverse events, vital signs, electrocardiogram (ECGs), laboratory tests, and physical examinations will be reported during the study from randomization up to Day 43
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Date of randomization up to Day 43

primaryOutcomes.measure: Number of adverse events including type and severity of a priming IV dose followed by an escalating second IV dose
primaryOutcomes.description: Number, type and severity of adverse events, vital signs, electrocardiogram (ECGs), laboratory tests, and physical examinations will be reported during the study from randomization up to Day 36
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Date of randomization up to Day 36

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Blood concentration of XmAb7195 and blood levels of human anti-human antibodies after single-dose IV administration of XmAb7195
secondaryOutcomes.description: Pharmocokinetic (PK) analysis for levels of XmAb7195 will be determined in subjects blood from time of initial dosing up to Day 43
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Time of dosing up to Day 43

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Blood concentration of XmAb7195 and blood levels of human anti-human antibodies after a priming IV dose followed by an escalating second IV dose of XmAb7195
secondaryOutcomes.description: Presence of human anti-human antibodies will be assessed from time of dosing up to Day 36
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Time of dosing up to Day 36

overallOfficials.name: Ronald Goldwater, MD
overallOfficials.affiliation: Parexel Baltimore Early Phase Clinical Unit

locations.facility: Parexel Baltimore Early Phase Clinical Unit

ancestors.term: Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities
